title: Gabriel Rodrigues
text:
PhD Student in Genetics and Molecular Biology, with an emphasis on Bioinformatics. I am currently developing pipelines for RNAseq data to study plant innate immune systems and viral diversity from RNA samples.


Universidade Estadual de Santa Cruz, Brazil | Ilhéus, BA MSc. in Genetics and Molecular Biology
Universidade Federal do Sul da Bahia, Brazil | Itabuna, BA Bachelor in Interdisciplinary Sciences



Hard Skills: Python | R | Bash | Linux | Conda and Bioconda | Docker | Quarto | Shiny
Know-How: Biostatistics | NGS Data | Pipeline Devlopment | Differential Gene Expression | Dashboards | Biological Databases

title: About
text: PhD Student in Genetics and Molecular Biology, with an emphasis on Bioinformatics. I am currently developing pipelines for RNAseq data to study plant innate immune systems and viral diversity from RNA samples.

title: Education
text:
PhD (2025 - Current time)

Working with ViralQuest pipeline, a tool designed to characterize viral sequences in contigs samples. For more info 



Master’s Degree (2023 - 2025)
Universidade Estadual de Santa Cruz, Brazil | Ilhéus, BA MSc. in Genetics and Molecular Biology

Has experience and published works with viral genomic survillance in Theobroma cacao public data to screening new viral putative sequences in RNA-Seq libraries in public databases.
Worked with identification of PRRs and NLRs genes in Theobroma cacao RNA-Seq public data to screen expressed genes in different tissues, genotypes and condition (inoculated with P. megakarya) and performs differential gene expression analysis between these groups.



Bachelor’s Degree
Universidade Federal do Sul da Bahia, Brazil | Itabuna, BA Bachelor in Interdisciplinary Sciences

Worked with chemodiversity of the native populations of Atlantic forest plant Schinus terebinthifolia Raddi.
